title: Outlook: Create User Profiles
description:
Users can now create a distraction free experience by creating profiles which helps set boundaries within the accounts like notifications, theming, etc. Note: Users need to have at least two accounts to create profiles.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/manage-profiles-in-the-new-outlook-for-mac-181478f2-790a-47a2-8fac-82cac39bca6b
